name: vaulta-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Vaulta: SDK, client and server. Build, test and release tooling for the Vaulta project.

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix package && npm install --prefix apps/server && npm install --prefix apps/client
scripts.build: npm run build:sdk && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: rimraf package/dist && rimraf apps/server/dist && rimraf apps/client/dist
scripts.test: echo "No top-level tests configured. Run package-specific tests."

author: Hasnain
